sources.title: Girls in Chains (1943) EDGAR G. ULMER
sources.description:
Stars: Arline Judge, Roger Clark, Robin Raymond
Director: Edgar G. Ulmer

When a teacher loses her job because her brother-in-law is a racketeer, she takes a position at a girls' reformatory.

sources.title: Girls in Chains (1943) Arline Judge & Roger Clark | Crime, Drama Movie

When a teacher loses her job because her brother-in-law is a racketeer, she takes a position at a girls' reformatory.

metadata.Plot: When Ruth Martin is discharged from her teaching position because her sister is married to a notorious criminal (who is basically running the city), she accepts a job at a girls correctional facility. Her intent is to try and prepare the inmates for a better life once they are released. Ruth runs up against the supervisor (who is controlled by her brother-in-law) who is only interested in skimming money off the budget and his gang of matrons who only want to keep the girls in line doing laundry.
metadata.Actors: Arline Judge, Roger Clark, Robin Raymond
